questions.question: What is Breeding Journey?
questions.answer: Breeding Journey is a comprehensive digital platform designed for dog breeders. It helps you track heat cycles, plan matings, monitor pregnancies, manage litters and puppies, and keep all your breeding records organized in one place.

questions.question: How does the free trial work?
questions.answer: New users get a 30-day free trial with full access to all features. You'll need to add a payment method during registration, but you won't be charged until the trial period ends. You can cancel anytime during the trial.

questions.question: What subscription plans are available?
questions.answer: We offer monthly and yearly subscription plans. The yearly plan provides a significant discount compared to paying monthly. Both plans include full access to all features.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All data is encrypted, and we use industry-standard security practices. Your breeding records are private and only accessible to you.

questions.question: What devices can I use?
questions.answer: Breeding Journey works on any device with a web browser - computers, tablets, and smartphones. The interface is mobile-friendly, perfect for use in the whelping box.

questions.question: Do you offer support?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide email support for all users.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app?
questions.answer: Yes! Breeding Journey is available as both a web app and a mobile app for iOS and Android. Your account works across all devices.

questions.question: Can I track multiple dogs?
questions.answer: Yes! You can add as many dogs, litters, and pregnancies as you need. Breeding Journey is built for both small and large breeding programs.

questions.question: Can I delete my data or account?
questions.answer: Yes. You can delete your account anytime, and all associated data will be permanently removed.

questions.question: How is my data stored?
questions.answer: Your data is securely stored in Supabase, using encrypted connections and industry-standard authentication. Only you can access your breeding records.

questions.question: Does Breeding Journey work for all breeds?
questions.answer: Yes! Breeding Journey works for all dog breeds. Whether you breed small or large dogs, the app adapts to your needs.

questions.question: Do I need previous breeding experience?
questions.answer: No, Breeding Journey is designed for both experienced breeders and newcomers. The app guides you through heat cycles, pregnancies, and puppy care step by step.

moreQuestions.title: Still have questions?
moreQuestions.description: We're here to help! Reach out to our support team.
